entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
